title: Braised ox cheek, pickled walnuts, smoked anchovy, glazed carrots and mash
description: Just leave everything braising in the oven for deliciously tender ox cheeks and extra rich sauce to go with the creamy mash.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 head of garlic, cut in half horizontally
300g/11oz Chantenay carrots, cut in half lengthways
1kg/2lb 4oz Maris Piper or Yukon Gold potatoes
